explains: v. 借给，借出；贷出，贷（款）；给……增加，增添（特色）；给予，提供（帮助、支持等）；使适合，使易遭受
wordGroup: lend itself to 适用于，适宜于；有助于
lend a helping hand 伸出援助之手， 助一臂之力
lend support to 支持；支援
lend out vt. 租出去；借出
lend one's countenance to 赞成；支持

sentences.en: Here, I'll lend you my pen.
Can you lend me five quid?
They refused to lend us the money.
